import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { RouterLink, RouterLinkActive } from '@angular/router'; import { NgClass } from '@angular/common'; @Component({ selector: 'app-header', templateUrl: './header.component.html', styleUrls: ['./header.component.css'], standalone: true, imports: [RouterLink, RouterLinkActive], // Include the directives here }) export class HeaderComponent { }
